description:
syscall: add TCGETA, TCSETA, TCSETAW and TCSETAF on Linux

    Issue #2322 (syscall.TIOC{G,S}ETA constants missing) was closed with status
"WorkingAsIntended", which is correct. However, the proposed solution
was not viable for these users: the platform-specific constants
(TC{G,S}ETA) are not yet included in the syscall package for Linux.

This little patch adds TCGETA, TCSETA, TCSETAW and TCSETAF to the Linux
incarnation of the syscall package.

More details in the original (closed) issue:

http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=2322
subject: syscall: add TCGETA, TCSETA, TCSETAW and TCSETAF on Linux
